name: MUSIC FRIEND (filth witch)
description:
Filth Witch is a witchy spell generator by Neotenomie with text by Porpentine, starring a character from Lily Zone's upcoming game Crypt Underworld (based on rodentcider's cryptsona). Click the orbs to weave a unique spell, or leave it on in the background for the haunting melody…

Spells generate based on the last three orbs you click. so if i want a (nature|cuteness) verb with a (fire|skin disease) modifier that ends with a (water|ice|sadness) noun, i can click green>red>blue. each orb has its own elements and words associated with it. ChEcK oUt ThE cOoL cOmBiNaTiOnS!!
